thread.title: Watch: 5 Reasons Why Yoga Is the Worst
thread.title_full: Watch: 5 Reasons Why Yoga Is the Worst

author: Hannah McGoldrick
title: Watch: 5 Reasons Why Yoga Is the Worst
text:
Privacy Policy | About Us 
They still do yoga and they still love yoga (even if it doesn’t sound like it), but between the moaning and the bodily functions and the hours of sitting quietly on the floor, yoga isn’t their favorite thing. 
But it is one of their favorite things to talk about. Perhaps you too have tight hamstrings and can’t do a successful downward dog. And maybe you have trouble dealing with the fact that all the names of the poses make you think of cute animals. Whether you love or hate yoga, make sure to tell us! And happy om-ing! (If you do love yoga and running, then check out the RW Yoga for Runners Workout DVD .)
